post.title: Cross-Origin Resource Policy (CORP)
post.body:
- https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Cross-Origin_Resource_Policy_(CORP)

如果父级设置了 `Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy`

```ts
[
  {
    key: 'Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy',
    value: 'require-corp',
  },
  {
    key: 'Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy',
    value: 'same-origin',
  },
]
```

引用外部链接会无法工作，比如说 s3 img 资源。需要设置 header

example: `cross-origin-resource-policy: cross-origin`

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/172420995-8a5a81ea-007d-4c42-b09e-38a241014389.png)


```ts
Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-site | same-origin | cross-origin
```
post.html:
• https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Cross-Origin_Resource_Policy_(CORP)

如果父级设置了 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy

[
  {
    key: 'Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy',
    value: 'require-corp',
  },
  {
    key: 'Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy',
    value: 'same-origin',
  },
]

引用外部链接会无法工作，比如说 s3 img 资源。需要设置 header

example: cross-origin-resource-policy: cross-origin

Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-site | same-origin | cross-origin
